scenarios.title: No ProviderOne Record
scenarios.description: During eligibility review, the client’s record does not appear in ProviderOne.
scenarios.question: What is the correct next step?

options.A: Skip verification and proceed with enrollment
options.B: Change AH Intake to ‘More PII Needed’ and request missing identifiers

scenarios.explanation: Update the status so the case manager is notified to gather additional PII.

scenarios.title: Medicaid Inactive
scenarios.description: ProviderOne shows Medicaid inactive; the client is otherwise eligible.
scenarios.question: How should intake proceed?

options.A: Set status to ‘Medicaid Inactive’ and inform case manager; pause enrollment
options.B: Proceed with SH and SE submissions immediately

scenarios.explanation: Enrollment is delayed until coverage resumes; automation notifies the case manager.

scenarios.title: Eligible and Submitting
scenarios.description: All checks are complete; the client appears eligible.
scenarios.question: Which action triggers online submissions to Wellpoint?
scenarios.explanation: Changing the status triggers Zapier to submit SH and SE and save confirmations.

scenarios.title: Denial Handling
scenarios.description: Wellpoint returns a denial for SH.
scenarios.question: What should staff expect from automation?

options.A: A Slack #admin message and the email file saved to the client’s folder

scenarios.explanation: Automation posts to Slack and saves the response file to Drive and the client folder.
